summary: Ultra-skimpy lingerie armor for the discerning nudist.
descriptionHtml:
This is a retexture and reworking of the Neo Scouter Corset by Neovinci. You can find these items hidden in bedrooms across Skyrim. Look for the special bag, you'll know it when you see it. <3

Versions
UNP (also works on 7 body)
UNPB BBP


Credits
Neovinci - Neo Scouter Corset
MrTroublemaker - UNPB BBP conversion

Permissions
If you would like to convert this to another body, have at it. Beyond that I give you permission to do whatever you want with these assets as long as Neovinci gives you permission.

Craftable Leather & Lace by Dragonjoe69
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55948/?

FAQ

CBBE? UNP Top Model? 7body? ADEC? Lady Body? UNPB TBB BBP? HDT? - No. The same goes for any other body. I don't use them and I have other things I am working on.

Can I convert this to another body. - No. Just kidding, yes. But I'm not going to.

Are you going to finish the missing parts? - No. Have at it though. It should be easy enough to do with just a basic understanding of photoshop/gimp.

Can I kiss you? - No. I do accept endorsements though.

This armor sucks! - Yeah, well you want ebony armor wear ebony armor. Don't expect to deflect crossbow bolts in your underwear.

OMFG skimpy armor? - Yes. Decapitating people, burning them alive, putting an arrow in their skull and stabbing them in the back is all fine but nudity is bad! But really, why are even looking at this?

Can I translate this? - Yes.

Updates
version 1b - Fixed error in the bag nif placement and missing texture files
version 1c - Removed accidental long leather boot entry
version 1d - Repaired black leather boots
author: Zonzai
